Blob.summary: The Blob object represents a blob, which is a file-like object of immutable, raw data; they can be read as text or binary data, or converted into a so its methods can be used for processing the data.

remarks.para: Blobs can represent data that isn't necessarily in a JavaScript-native format. The interface is based on Blob, inheriting blob functionality and expanding it to support files on the user's system.
